title: 5k Run/Walk Over the Bridge
text: 5k Run/Walk Over the Bridge at 5k run/walk over the Bridge Sat Oct 17 5k run/walk over the Bridge Smith Point Park Beach 5k run/walk across the bridge at Smith Point. Coffee at the start, pizza and raffles at the finish. Kids welcome, walkers welcome, fast fast runners welcome, lots of competition! Face painting for kids who are cheering or after they run. Medals for age group winners 1-3rd place. Great fun, then you go pumpkin picking straight from the run before the crowds get out east! Register early for a long sleeved tee!! Proceeds benefit Mercy Center's three shelters for homeless teen girls and teen moms!
